name: portarias
description: Sistema de Controle de Portarias - CRORS

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.start: npm run build:frontend && npm run start:backend
scripts.dev: echo 'Para desenvolvimento, execute em terminais separados:' && echo '  Terminal 1: npm run dev:backend' && echo '  Terminal 2: npm run dev:frontend'
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix backend && npm run lint:fix --prefix frontend
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix backend && npm run format --prefix frontend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --prefix backend && npm run format:check --prefix frontend
